document.full_text: if the boston bruins come back from their early deficit to win the stanley cup, they will probably do so by defying the hockey bromide that you cannot succeed without a good power play.
document.title: on hockey: even strength has been the bruins' big advantage
lines_and_colors: if the boston bruins come back from their early deficit to win the stanley cup, they will probably do so by defying the hockey bromide that you cannot succeed without a good power play.
